name: Ludu Hare and the Magical Carrot
name_original: Ludu Hare and the Magical Carrot
description:
Ludu Hare and the Magical Carrot Ludum Dare #48 entry

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/48/ludu-hare-and-the-magical-carrot

While Ludu 🐰 is dozing in the warm light of the Magical Carrot 🥕, dreaming fluffy dreams, the shifty Mole King 👑 steals it.

Help Ludu to find his way through the Mole Kingdom and bring the Magical Carrot home!

CONTROLS Controller

left bumper: move

x: kick 

b: roll 

a: jump

Keyboard

W A S D

or

UP DOWN LEFT RIGHT

Attack: E   

Roll: Ctrl
